location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to the Commanders of Ships or Vessels under British colours trading to the Port of Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing potential recipients that the Resident must depart Bushire to travel into the Persian interior. It notes that in his absence Messrs Essaie Johannes (the Broker) and Arrathoon Malcolm (the Linguist) have been placed in charge of the British factory at Bushire.
